L, R = PCM Data
S = 2 bit PCM 16


PCM 14

L         100101010010010101101010101001011011010101 = 42 bit /dev/random
R         010100010101010101010100110101010010110110 = 42 bit /dev/random


L0        10010101001001
R0        01010001010101
L1        01011010101010
R1        01010101001101
L2        01011011010101
R2        01010010110110




PCM 16

L         111110000000110011110110100000001111010100001110 = 48 bit /Shunshoku.l.s16be.44100.pcm
R         111101101000001011110011010111011111000001010001 = 48 bit /Shunshoku.r.s16be.44100.pcm

                         S
L0        11111000000011 00
R0        11110110100000 10
L1        11110110100000 00
R1        11110011010111 01
L2        11110101000011 10
R2        11110000010100 01
